hero.subline: 18 years of local expertise. $150M+ in career sales. Your trusted partner from search to closing.
hero.headline: Find Your Perfect Home in Westchester County

agentIntro.body: With 18 years of experience in Westchester County real estate, I've helped over 500 families buy, sell, and invest with confidence. My approach is simple: deep local knowledge, honest advice, and relentless dedication to your goals. Whether you're buying your first home or selling a multi-million dollar estate, you'll have a trusted partner by your side every step of the way.
